message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a novel framework for continual learning in artificial intelligence, specifically addressing the problem of catastrophic forgetting. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). The paper also involves image classification tasks, which suggests that it may belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) or natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories.
